text: Posted in: Marvel Studios, Movies | Tagged: the fantastic four: first stepsFour high-quality images from The Fantastic Four: First Steps have been released. The film will be released on July 25th.Article Summary Marvel Studios releases four new high-quality images for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, out July 25th. The upcoming film lands in a crowded summer, competing with other major blockbusters for box office attention. Excitement for The Fantastic Four: First Steps is building as the marketing campaign begins to ramp up. The movie is expected to kick off a new era for the Fantastic Four within the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The Marvel Cinematic Universe had a bit of a reset with the release of Thunderbolts * The New Avengers earlier this month. It's not only a critical success, but it's also doing well at the box office. While the racists are being stupid on main regarding Ironheart, The Fantastic Four: First Steps is¬†coming out in July. The film is bookended by a ton of other big releases, promising that the film isn't a sure thing, no matter how excited everyone is for it. We're all broke, and going to the movies is expensive, and when at least three big movies are coming out in a three-week period, you might have to make a choice, and it will be interesting to see which of the big releases people choose. The Fantastic Four: First Steps feels like it's about to lift off as far as marketing goes, but until then, the official Disney media site was updated with four high-quality images. The Fantastic Four: First Steps ‚Äì Summary, Cast List, Release Date Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps¬†introduces Marvel's First Family‚ÄîReed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus' plan to devour the entire planet and everyone on it weren't bad enough, it suddenly gets very personal.¬†The action adventure also stars Paul Walter Hauser,¬†John Malkovich,¬†Natasha Lyonne,¬†and¬†Sarah Niles.¬†Directed by¬†Matt Shakman, produced by¬†Kevin Feige,¬†and executive produced by¬†Louis D'Esposito,¬†Grant Curtis,¬†and Tim Lewis,¬†Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters July 25, 2025. html:
Posted in: Marvel Studios, Movies | Tagged: the fantastic four: first steps

Four high-quality images from The Fantastic Four: First Steps have been released. The film will be released on July 25th.

Article Summary

  • Marvel Studios releases four new high-quality images for The Fantastic Four: First Steps, out July 25th.
  • The upcoming film lands in a crowded summer, competing with other major blockbusters for box office attention.
  • Excitement for The Fantastic Four: First Steps is building as the marketing campaign begins to ramp up.
  • The movie is expected to kick off a new era for the Fantastic Four within the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

The Marvel Cinematic Universe had a bit of a reset with the release of Thunderbolts * The New Avengers earlier this month. It's not only a critical success, but it's also doing well at the box office. While the racists are being stupid on main regarding Ironheart, The Fantastic Four: First Steps is¬†coming out in July. The film is bookended by a ton of other big releases, promising that the film isn't a sure thing, no matter how excited everyone is for it. We're all broke, and going to the movies is expensive, and when at least three big movies are coming out in a three-week period, you might have to make a choice, and it will be interesting to see which of the big releases people choose. The Fantastic Four: First Steps feels like it's about to lift off as far as marketing goes, but until then, the official Disney media site was updated with four high-quality images.

The Fantastic Four: First Steps ‚Äì Summary, Cast List, Release Date

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps¬†introduces Marvel's First Family‚ÄîReed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus' plan to devour the entire planet and everyone on it weren't bad enough, it suddenly gets very personal.¬†The action adventure also stars Paul Walter Hauser,¬†John Malkovich,¬†Natasha Lyonne,¬†and¬†Sarah Niles.¬†Directed by¬†Matt Shakman, produced by¬†Kevin Feige,¬†and executive produced by¬†Louis D'Esposito,¬†Grant Curtis,¬†and Tim Lewis,¬†Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters July 25, 2025.

Enjoyed this? Please share on social media!

Stay up-to-date and support the site by following Bleeding Cool on Google News today!

About Kaitlyn Booth

Kaitlyn is the Editor-in-Chief at Bleeding Cool. Film critic and pop culture writer since 2013. Ace. Leftist. Nerd. Feminist. Writer. Replicant Translator. Cinephillic Virtue Signaler. She/Her. UFCA/GALECA Member. üçÖ Approved. Follow her Threads, Instagram, and Twitter @katiesmovies.

Latest by Kaitlyn Booth

Lilo & Stitch: Working With Stitch BTS Featurette Plus 3 New Images

Disney released a new behind-the-scenes featurette for Lilo & Stitch, which spotlights...working with Stitch? Plus three new images.

Paramount Pictures Shifts 3 Animated Films Release Dates

Paramount has shifted the release dates of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles sequel, Paw Patrol: The Dino Movie, and The Legend of Aang: The Last Airbender.

28 Years Later: 2 New International Posters Released

Two new international posters for 28 Years Later have been released. The film will be released in theaters on June 20th.

Sunrise on the Reaping: Ralph Fiennes Cast As President Snow

The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping has found its President Snow, and it's the always fantastic Ralph Fiennes.

Ballerina: Eve Uses Ice Skates As A Weapon In A New Clip

Ice skates? As a weapon? That's a thing that happens in a new clip from Ballerina, which was released today, and it's awesome.

Superman: Nicholas Hoult Says In Lex's Mind, "He Should Be Adored"

Superman star Nicholas Hoult says Lex Luthor is "obsessive, determined, and relentless, and there's a lot of emotion pushing through all of that in a way."
